alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:34AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Florence, west central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through NOON EDT... At 1134 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Claussen, or 8 miles southeast of Florence, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Poston, Francis Marion University, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen, Kingsburg, Scranton, Coward and Lake City Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
